overview: A shooting takes place in the middle of a downtown area, and as a result, many members of the organization lose their lives. However, in the process, the stolen base grows into the boss's right arm, and he is not satisfied with this and seeks an opportunity to gain more power. It depicts the heartbreaking story of the Yakuza in a serious, comical and exaggerated style, and the performance of Ken Watanabe, who plays the boss, is impressive.
title: Another Battle/Conspiracy
